title: Edukkinda piravi
sahitya:
Edukkinda piravi vandadO aruLANDavanE


anupallavi

  kAdal valaiyil tuDikkavO summA kaTra vAdam paDikkavO 
sAdhu enrE naDikkavO sahajAlak-kaNNIr vaDikkavO ayyA


caraNam    ponnukkAgha maNNukkAghap-pOr puriyavO pugazhukkAga mEDai Erip-pozhindu tIravO
tannai arindu talaivan Anai tannai arindu kAlam arindu shivattai arindu sukhattai arindu tirundavO tAn
